placeholder.name: Name
placeholder.payload: payload data of the send message
placeholder.timeLimits: Select days and / or months for which it should be valid
placeholder.days: select days wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.months: select months wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.recalcTime: Interval of a recalculation of the time for send a message.
placeholder.once: define if the node should emit a message independent of the time a message on flow start

tips.addTimes: Alternative time: If the specified property has the value 'true', the trigger is triggered at the specified alternative time instead of the normal specified time. This is useful for triggering a flow at a different time on public holidays or other special days.
tips.recalc: If the time stamp is defined by a flow or global context, changes to the values do not lead to an immediate change in the planned trigger time, but only when a recalculation is carried out. This can be used to set a regular recalculation.

errors.failed: inject failed, see log for details
errors.invalid-daterange: Day is today not in valid range.
